job.title: Controls Project Engineer
job.description:
If you are a Controls Project Engineer with experience, please read on!
We are a company with an expertise in custom product specific tooling, machine design and manufacturing. We pride ourselves on having a creative team that can take on any challenge. We have a world class design and engineering department that is here to take care of our customers in any way that they need. If you are looking to join a highly skilled team that has been around for over 45 years you have come to the right place!
What You Will Be Doing
You will start a project at the beginning and follow it through to our customer installation acceptance. You will review customer specifications, standards, their past projects, and work with our team of hardware engineers to complete the controls portions of the machine. You will work with the software engineers to develop software using the same criteria. You will be responsible for producing a quality design on schedule, getting customer acceptance, reviewing panel build and assisting as required while the machine is being built. Travel is possible for customer meetings, field checks or installation support.
What You Need for this Position
10+ years of experience related to controls engineering
Bachelor's degree in electrical / computer engineer or electrical technology
Experience in designing controls and hardware
Proficient in logic programming for most PLC and HMI systems
Experience in following customer specifications as well as local and federal standards for automated equipment
Experience in electrical and fluid power design, PLC and HMI software
Experience in conducting field checks of existing equipment
Ability to develop and read sequence of operations
What's In It for You
$40 - $50 an hour
Benefits
So, if you are a Controls Project Engineer with experience, please apply today!
